page.title: 02Coastline
page.content: We went to three bays and collected information from{Home Farm } bay ,{St.Audries}bay and{Doniford} bay.In the{cliffs}the rock consists of a mixture of sandstone,limestone and slate but some of the cliffs are made out of sand and mud .On the ground are pebbles and sand and large rocks. On some of the rocks is wet moss. In between some of the{rocks}are small{rockpools}with shellfish and crabs and seaweed.On the shore are groynes, wave breakers, and mooring posts in the sea.In the sea there are very strong currents. There are two bays with a{fresh {water spring in each.}The fresh water springs are very strong.You can swim and bathe in both of the bays. Trees are growing on the tops of the cliffs which means the soil must be very good for a coastline
